mapper.select: SELECT LETTER.*, JF.F_SV_NAME, F_SEQ, IF(LETTER.L_SENDER=#{session_m_seq} , 'SENDER', 'RECIVER') AS SEND FROM ( SELECT JL.L_SEQ, JL.L_SENDER, JL.L_RECIVER, JL.L_TITLE, JL.L_OPEN_YN, JM.M_NICKNAME, JL.L_SENDT, JM.M_SEQ FROM JH_LETTER JL JOIN JH_MEMBER JM ON JM.M_SEQ = JL.L_SENDER WHERE JL.L_RECIVER=#{session_m_seq} AND JL.L_RECIVER_TRASH_STEP=#{categoryType} AND JM.M_DEL_YN = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT JL.L_SEQ, JL.L_SENDER, JL.L_RECIVER, JL.L_TITLE, JL.L_OPEN_YN, JM.M_NICKNAME , JL.L_SENDT, JM.M_SEQ FROM JH_LETTER JL JOIN JH_MEMBER JM ON JM.M_SEQ = JL.L_RECIVER WHERE JL.L_SENDER=#{session_m_seq} AND JL.L_SENDER_TRASH_STEP=#{categoryType} AND JM.M_DEL_YN = 'N' ) AS LETTER JOIN JH_FILE JF ON LETTER.M_SEQ = JF.F_TYPE_SEQ WHERE JF.F_TYPE = 'M' AND JF.F_DEL_YN = 'N' AND JF.F_MAIN_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY LETTER.L_SENDT DESC

SELECT JL.L_SEQ, JL.L_SENDER, JL.L_RECIVER, JL.L_TITLE, JL.L_OPEN_YN, JM.M_NICKNAME, JL.L_SENDT, JM.M_SEQ, JF.F_SV_NAME, F_SEQ FROM JH_LETTER JL JOIN JH_MEMBER JM ON JM.M_SEQ = JL.L_SENDER JOIN JH_FILE JF ON JM.M_SEQ = JF.F_TYPE_SEQ WHERE JL.L_RECIVER=#{session_m_seq} AND JL.L_RECIVER_TRASH_STEP='0'

SELECT JL.L_SEQ, JL.L_SENDER, JL.L_RECIVER, JL.L_TITLE, JL.L_OPEN_YN, JM.M_NICKNAME, JL.L_SENDT, JM.M_SEQ, JF.F_SV_NAME, F_SEQ FROM JH_LETTER JL JOIN JH_MEMBER JM ON JM.M_SEQ = JL.L_RECIVER JOIN JH_FILE JF ON JM.M_SEQ = JF.F_TYPE_SEQ WHERE JL.L_SENDER=#{session_m_seq} AND JL.L_SENDER_TRASH_STEP='0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO acorncalendar.JH_LETTER (L_SENDER, L_RECIVER, L_TITLE, L_CONTENT, L_SENDT, L_OPEN_YN, L_SENDER_TRASH_STEP, L_RECIVER_TRASH_STEP) VALUES (#{session_m_seq}, #{lReciver}, #{lTitle}, #{lContent}, current_timestamp(), 'N', 0, 0);
